attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2024-0014

Date: 2024-01-11

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, under subsection 5(2) of the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Act, appoints Robert Wright, of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Deputy Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations, to hold office during pleasure, and fixes his remuneration and certain conditions of employment as set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within the range ($238,000 - $280,000), effective January 22, 2024.


 

Sur recommandation du premier ministre et en vertu du paragraphe 5(2) de la Loi sur le ministère des Relations Couronne-Autochtones et des Affaires du Nord, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil nomme Robert Wright, d’Ottawa (Ontario), sous-ministre délégué des Relations Couronne-Autochtones, à titre amovible, et fixe sa rémunération et certaines conditions d’emploi conformément à l’annexe ci-jointe, lequel traitement se situe dans l’échelle (238 000 $ – 280 000 $), à compter du 22 janvier 2024.
